snippet.title: Video Game Review: No More Heroes 2: Desperate Struggle
snippet.description: Extreme violence, profanity, and sex make this not for kids.

snippet.title: Movie Review: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
snippet.description: A jungle tale that's literally escapist will have kids going wild with laughter, and give parents some warm fuzzies, too.

snippet.title: Television Review: Jake 2.0
snippet.description: Upgraded hero show is fun for tweens and up.

snippet.title: Music Review: Juice Box Heroes
snippet.description: Friendly, lively songs with a message.

snippet.title: Game Review: Dragon Ball: Raging Blast 2
snippet.description: Repetitive fighting; only for the most devoted fans.

snippet.title: Game Review: Iron Man 2
snippet.description: Everything is blowing up all the time in this movie game.

snippet.title: Game Review: 3-D Dot Game Heroes
snippet.description: Fun, creative retro adventure serves as homage/satire.

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Republic Heroes
snippet.description: While the force is with you, fighting with it is too hard.

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Emergency Heroes
snippet.description: Action-packed racing game fails to impress.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Pokemon Heroes
snippet.description: Below-average and too violent for younger kids.
